messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] aizu shoami / nara tsuba for sale
messages.msgSnippet: Please send me pics, thanks. Alan Bale ... From: stevieb1965uk  To:  Sent: Wednesday, February 16, 2005
messages.messageBody:
Please send me pics, thanks.
Alan Bale
----- Original Message -----
From: "stevieb1965uk" <sstephenbarrow@...>
To: <nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, February 16, 2005 5:54 PM
Subject: [nihontostudy] aizu shoami / nara tsuba for sale




decided to sell this beautiful tsuba...was sending it to japan for
shinsa in january but the agent never replied in time,,,was a gift
from japanese goverment to a reverent here in the uk in around
1920.photos in my album stevieb1965uk.basically made around the 1850s
and quality is exellent.appears to be never been mounted and the
detail is brilliant,,,,please email me for more pics and
measurements,,,,,,,asking price which i think is very low for this
tsuba is £750 .
